creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: five-character poem; loopy, bold characters; small inscription at R
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

center: [Religious spirit spreads across the four seas] (Dofu yo shikai) (Dofu o shikai ni agaru)
markings: Seals ULC and lower R: [Rinzai Seishu]; [Bukkoku Shujin]; [Seidon]
object_name: Hanging scroll, one of a triptych (right)
title: Single-Line Calligraphy (from a triptych of single-line calligraphies)
